LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsRifle.label: tactics rifle
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsRifle.description: The rifle is equipped with a special auxiliary aiming device, which makes it easier to attack key parts. (33% chance to target head)
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SZMechNekoTacticsRifle.label: tactics bullet
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsKnife.label: tactics knife
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsKnife.description: The knife is equipped with a special auxiliary aiming device, which makes it easier to attack key parts. (Ignore 25% melee dodge of target)
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsKnife.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsKnife.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsKnife.tools.2.label: blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerHelmetF.label: enhanced arcaner helmet F
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerHelmetF.descri: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerHelmetM.label: enhanced arcaner helmet M
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerHelmetM.descri: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerArmor.label: enhanced arcaner armor
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnhancedArcanerArmor.descript: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerHelmetF.label: psychic arcaner helmet F
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerHelmetF.descrip: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent. It can also provide a certain degree of increase in psychic ablity.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerHelmetM.label: psychic arcaner helmet M
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerHelmetM.descrip: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent. It can also provide a certain degree of increase in psychic ablity.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerArmor.label: psychic arcaner armor
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PsychicArcanerArmor.descripti: A kind of armor suit made of special material, with special force field generating device, can directly resist the damage to a certain extent. It can also provide a certain degree of increase in psychic ablity.
